originalText.text: I've been using Manhattan Water Company since July of 2021 ... I think the delivery staff are great - as someone that's working from home & juggling calls, they always give me 10-15 minute warnings of their arrival, they move quickly when delivering to my home and are always friendly & nice (this is not an easy job in NYC - I can't say I'd stay so friendly day after day dealing with traffic, lugging 5 gallon jugs, etc.).  Also very easy to communicate and make adjustments to deliveries when dealing with their customer service ...

originalText.text: Manhattan Water Company is the BEST! Reliable and their prices are great. Glad we switched to them, now we get great water delivered without any hassles. Thank you MW!

text.text: Manhattan Water Company is the BEST! Reliable and their prices are great. Glad we switched to them, now we get great water delivered without any hassles. Thank you MW!

originalText.text:
I highly recommend the Manhattan Water Company. I've been using them for about 4 years now at my apartment and have always had excellent customer service. The water tastes great! Marc is wonderful and responds quickly and is always able to accommodate my delivery requests the same week.

I started with the Manhattan Water Company as a student and they delivered to my dorm room. When I moved out they picked up my water unit and set me up with a new unit in my apartment that I have been using ever since.  I have only had 1 leaky bottle over 4 years and they were quick to replace it. The gentlemen who deliver the bottles are consistently excellent as well. (Shout out to Louis!)  Thank you so much!

originalText.text: Been using Manhattan Water as my companies main supplier of bottled water for almost two years - switched to them after having a ton of bad experiences with Ready Refresh.  Manhattan Water has been super reliable, always on time, and I highly recommend them.

text.text: Been using Manhattan Water as my companies main supplier of bottled water for almost two years - switched to them after having a ton of bad experiences with Ready Refresh.  Manhattan Water has been super reliable, always on time, and I highly recommend them.

originalText.text: Amazing customer service, and their NY natural spring water is even better. We have been getting service from them now for over 5 months and they deliver on time all the time. Our office gets bi weekly delivery and goes through 20 bottles every delivery. They never give us to much or to little always as ordered. Love this company, so happy we switched from Ready Refresh they are horrible. Thanks Manhattan Water and keep up the great service. See you guys next week for our next delivery.
